title: User Authentication - Successful Login
description: Verify that user can login successfully with valid credentials using all supported authentication methods.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen.
Select an authentication method (email/password, social login etc.).
Enter valid credentials or complete social login flow.
Submit login request.
Verify user is authenticated and navigated to the main screen.
Verify secure session is established.

title: User Authentication - Failed Login
description: Verify login fails when invalid credentials are provided and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen.
Enter invalid username/email and/or password.
Submit login request.
Verify login is denied with an error message indicating invalid credentials.
Verify no session is established.

title: Reels Feed Loading and Pagination
description: Verify the reels feed loads reels correctly with infinite scroll pagination and smooth playback.

steps.description: Navigate to Reels feed screen.
Verify initial reels load without delay.
Scroll through Reels feed to trigger pagination.
Verify new reels load dynamically without UI freezes.
Verify each reel auto-plays on screen with no playback lag.

title: Reels Feed Interaction - Like, Share and Comment
description: Verify user can like, share, and comment on reels, with real-time updates reflected.

steps.description: Navigate to Reels feed screen.
Select a reel to interact.
Like the reel.
Verify the like count increments immediately.
Share the reel using the share options.
Verify share dialog appears and sharing completes without error.
Add a comment on the reel.
Verify comment is visible immediately in the comments section.

title: Virtual Gifting System - Gift Sending Flow
description: Validate full gift sending process including gift selection, message composition, sending, and notification display.

steps.description: Open a chat or user profile.
Select a gift from various rarity tiers.
Compose an optional gift message.
Send the gift to the recipient.
Verify the gift is deducted from sender's coin balance.
Verify the recipient receives a notification.
Verify animated gift display appears in chat and gift showcase.

title: Chat Functionality - Real-time Messaging and Media Sharing
description: Verify chat messages, including text, media, and gifts, send and receive in real-time with correct display.

steps.description: Open a real-time chat session.
Send a text message.
Verify the recipient receives the text message instantly.
Send a media file (image/video).
Verify media file is received and correctly rendered.
Send a gift within the chat.
Verify the gift animation and info appear in chat.

title: Ephemeral Stories - Posting, Viewing, and Expiration
description: Verify stories can be posted with various media types and expire correctly after 24 hours with privacy controls enforced.

steps.description: Post a story with photo, video, and text overlay capabilities.
Verify the story appears in the user's story feed.
Set various privacy options for the story.
Verify stories are visible only to allowed users based on privacy.
Wait 24 hours (or simulate expiration).
Verify the story is automatically removed and no longer visible.

title: Friend System - Friend Requests and Privacy
description: Ensure friend request sending, acceptance, rejection, and privacy settings behave correctly with caching optimizations.

steps.description: Send a friend request to another user.
Verify the recipient receives and can view the friend request.
Accept the friend request.
Verify both users show as friends and permissions apply accordingly.
Set friend privacy options (e.g. who can see posts).
Verify posts visibility respects the privacy settings.

title: Nearby Discovery - Location and Bluetooth Permissions and UI
description: Validate that enabling location and Bluetooth permissions triggers accurate nearby user discovery with sonar radar and wave animations.

steps.description: Enable location and Bluetooth permissions when prompted.
Verify the Nearby Discovery screen shows sonar radar visualization.
Verify nearby users are detected and displayed accurately on the radar.
Send a wave to a detected user.
Verify wave animation plays and if matched, match animation triggers.
Initiate chat after a successful match.
Verify chat opens and messages can be sent.

title: Marketplace Transactions - Purchase, Trading and History
description: Ensure marketplace and virtual store purchases, gift trading, and transaction histories are processed correctly.

steps.description: Browse gift catalog and select a limited edition gift.
Purchase a coin package.
Verify coin balance is updated after purchase.
Trade a gift to another user via marketplace.
Verify gift transfers properly and trade records updated.
View transaction history.
Verify all purchase and trade transactions are listed and accurate.

title: Notification System - Delivery and Grouping
description: Verify notifications are delivered timely, grouped sensibly, contain rich content, and support user actions.

steps.description: Trigger various notification types (messages, gifts, reels, social interactions).
Verify notifications appear promptly on device.
Verify multiple notifications are grouped when appropriate.
Verify notifications contain actionable buttons or links.
Interact with notification action buttons.
Verify correct in-app navigation or action performed.

title: Gamification Features - Achievements, Daily Rewards, and Referrals
description: Validate gamification mechanics including triggering achievements, daily login bonuses, referral rewards, and leaderboard updates.

steps.description: Perform actions to trigger achievements.
Verify achievements unlock and display properly.
Log in daily to claim daily reward.
Verify daily reward is credited once per day.
Send a referral link to a new user.
Verify referral reward is awarded after new user registration.
Check leaderboard rankings.
Verify leaderboard updates reflect user achievements and activity.

title: Business and Creator Pages - Analytics and Customization
description: Test Pages feature for business and creators including follower insights, analytics dashboards, and page customization options.

steps.description: Create or access a business/creator page.
Customize page elements such as profile, banner, and description.
Verify customization changes are saved and displayed correctly.
Access analytics dashboard.
Verify follower insights and engagement metrics display accurately and update with activity.

title: Account and App Settings Persistence and Security
description: Ensure that account, app, moderation, and security settings persist correctly and changes are secure.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to settings.
Change account settings such as password, email, and privacy preferences.
Modify app settings including notifications and appearance.
Adjust moderation preferences and security options.
Save all changes and log out.
Log back in and revisit settings.
Verify all settings changes persist correctly.
Verify security changes (like password updates) are enforced.

title: Performance Optimization - Smooth Scrolling and Media Uploads
description: Confirm app performs smoothly with effective scrolling, caching strategies, and background media uploads.

steps.description: Navigate and scroll through various feeds (Reels, Stories, Unified Feed).
Verify scrolling occurs with no noticeable lag or stutter.
Upload a reel or story with video content.
Verify background upload happens without blocking UI.
Check media caching by revisiting recently viewed reels or stories.
Verify media plays instantly from cache when reopened.

title: Moderation Features - Reporting, Blocking, and Admin Actions
description: Verify moderation tools allow users to report content, block others, and that admins can take necessary actions correctly.

steps.description: Report inappropriate content or user.
Verify report is logged and user receives feedback.
Block a user from interacting.
Verify blocked user cannot send messages or friend requests.
As admin, review and resolve reported items.
Verify admin actions update user/content status and trigger notifications/penalties.
